processingCommand.script:
! Backup modules
:SET &MODULES# = ""

:SET &FAILOVER#         = "false"
:SET &WMS_BACKUP#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_BACKUP#      = "false"
:SET &RW_BACKUP#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_BACKUP#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_BACKUP#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP#  = "false"

:SET &WMS_DB_BACKUP#    = "false"
:SET &REFS_DB_BACKUP#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_DB_BACKUP#    = "false"

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "WMS,")
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "REFS,")
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "RW,")
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_BACKUP# = "true"
:  SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "EMS,")
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
: SET &FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
: SET &FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
: SET &FAILOVER# = "true"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_BACKUP#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &FAILOVER#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &INSTANCE_STOP# = "N"
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_STOP#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&MODULES#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &MODULES# = SUBSTR(&MODULES#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &MODULES#,,WORKFLOW
